Title: RISK: Data Source Outage
Description: Feed provider experiences downtime or latency. LIKELIHOOD: Medium. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: Multi-source redundancy; 30s gap detection alerts; Auto-backfill from secondary; 4-hour manual intervention runbook. TRIGGER: >2 minute feed gap or >5s latency. OWNER: Data Engineering. REVIEW: Weekly.

Title: RISK: Model Performance Degradation
Description: Accuracy drops below acceptable thresholds. LIKELIHOOD: Medium. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: Daily evaluation runs; Automatic regression detection; Block deployment on failure; Retrain pipeline on standby. TRIGGER: Any metric below threshold for 2 consecutive runs. OWNER: ML Engineering. REVIEW: Weekly.

Title: RISK: Payment Gateway Failure
Description: Primary payment processor unavailable. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: Critical. MITIGATIONS: Backup payment processor configured; Automatic failover; Grace period for renewals; Manual processing runbook. TRIGGER: Gateway returns errors for >5 minutes. OWNER: Finance Ops. REVIEW: Monthly.

Title: RISK: Founder Identity Exposure
Description: Founder name/identity leaked publicly. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: Critical. MITIGATIONS: Host-only policy enforced; Brand monitoring active; Takedown procedures ready; Crisis comms prepared. TRIGGER: Monitoring alert or report. OWNER: Security. REVIEW: Weekly.

Title: RISK: Legal/Regulatory Challenge
Description: Claims challenged by regulators or litigants. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: Critical. MITIGATIONS: Evidence locker for all claims; Counsel review before publish; Claims checker automation; Insurance coverage. TRIGGER: Cease and desist or inquiry received. OWNER: Legal. REVIEW: Monthly.

Title: RISK: Live Event Technical Failure
Description: Stream, auction, or registration system fails during event. LIKELIHOOD: Medium. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: Full dry runs completed; Backup streaming platform; Manual auction fallback; Communication templates ready. TRIGGER: System unresponsive during live window. OWNER: Event Ops. REVIEW: Pre-event.

Title: RISK: Key Issuance Failure
Description: Unable to mint or deliver access keys. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: 5x retry with backoff; Manual issuance fallback; Payment hold until resolved; Customer communication templates. TRIGGER: Key mint fails after all retries. OWNER: Engineering. REVIEW: Post-event.

Title: RISK: Churn Spike
Description: Unexpected increase in subscription cancellations. LIKELIHOOD: Medium. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: Churn reason tracking; Win-back campaigns ready; Downgrade offers automated; Immediate analysis protocol. TRIGGER: Churn rate >2x baseline for any week. OWNER: Customer Success. REVIEW: Weekly.

Title: RISK: Data Breach
Description: Unauthorized access to member or business data. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: Critical. MITIGATIONS: Encryption at rest and in transit; Access logging; Incident response plan; Insurance coverage; Breach notification templates. TRIGGER: Anomalous access pattern or alert. OWNER: Security. REVIEW: Weekly.
Parent: M22: Threat Model and Response Playbooks

Title: RISK: Deepfake/Impersonation Attack
Description: Synthetic media used to impersonate founders or host. LIKELIHOOD: Low. IMPACT: High. MITIGATIONS: Media monitoring active; Verification protocols with partners; Rapid takedown procedures; Public statement templates. TRIGGER: Report or monitoring alert. OWNER: Security. REVIEW: Monthly.
Parent: M22: Threat Model and Response Playbooks
